alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Itasca and southwestern Koochiching Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kelliher, or 35 miles northeast of Bemidji, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Northome and Mizpah around 945 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gemmell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
